title: Follower count distribution on Twitter 2014
summary: The chart shows the Percentage of Twitter users at the Twitter street .
\\n The highest Percentage was 93.68 in the 301-400 Number followed by 2.75 percentage in the 101-200 Number , 93.68 percentage in 301-400 and finally 0.36 percentage in 401-500 .
gold: This statistic gives information on the follower count distribution on Twitter . As of April 2014 , 93.68 percent of Twitter users had between 1 and 100 followers on the microblogging site .
